short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab page for the Modern Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab page into a personalized hub with Nyutab. This sleek and stylish browser extension offers a range of features that make your browsing experience more enjoyable and efficient.

Quick Links: Easily access your most frequently visited websites with custom quick links.

News & Entertainment: Stay informed and entertained with a feed that includes the latest stories from Hacker News, Reddit, and RSS. Plus, enjoy a daily dose of humor with the meme feature.

Weather, Clock & Date: Keep track of the weather, time, and date right from your new tab page.

Games & Tools: Take a break and play games such as Sudoku, Minesweeper, 2048, and more. You can also try out breathing exercises and prayer times to keep yourself relaxed and focused.

Customization: Make the extension your own with the ability to choose from a variety of background images and tweak the settings to your liking.

Install Nyutab now and experience a better browsing experience with a more organized and personalized new tab page.
